nodes.text: The Cardio power system was a cybernetic implant that greatly increased the cardio-vascular recovery rate and pain tolerance of the wearer. This had the effect of granting what seemed to be almost supernatural stamina.
In KotOR, the playable character must have the implant feat at level 3 to equip these items, whereas in KotOR II: TSL, the playable character must have a constitution attribute of 16 or higher.
